description.english: You have raised a mushroom of your very own!

Unlock all 2-star daughters.
Unlock all 3-star daughters.
Raise a Cordyceps daughter.
Raise a... Potatoceps daughter?!
Unlock all the standard mushrooms!
Successfully raise 10 daughters.
Successfully raise 50 daughters.
Successfully raise 100 daughters.

displayName.english: All Things Return to the Dirt

description.english: Have a daughter fail to live on in life.
Have 10 daughters fail to live on in some way.
Have 20 daughters fail to live on in some way.
You've seen all the beauty nature's flora has to offer - at least, nearby.

displayName.english: In a Van, Down by the River

description.english: You've seen all the beauty nature's stones have to offer - at least, nearby.
You've unlocked all the special colors in your Chroma Collection!
See what I can't see - by unlocking all the colors in the Chroma Collection!
Acquire all ten parts of the lost suite in the Orchestrion.
Listen to all compositions the bard has to offer.
You've unlocked all the hidden music the world has to offer!
There is no road left untraveled - because you've unlocked every ending!
It didn't take you long to prioritize hunger over parenthood...
Help your daughter win an undaughter-like competition.
Die whilst playing as the Recluse.

displayName.english: I Love My Daughter (but not in a creepy way)

description.english: Raise your daughter with maximum affection.
Raise your daughter with zero affection.
Discover your first Culinary Liar!
Raise a daughter with visceral proclivities.
Endulge your visceral proclivities.
Introduce Caelia to the Worm King.

displayName.english: Checkmate! (That's what the humans say, right?)

description.english: Win a round of Stone, Scroll, Shears.
Drink a potion, to detrimental effect.
Drink a potion, to bountiful effect.
Have the Recluse die whilst playing as the daughter.
Enhance your very state of being.
Help a travelling craftswoman reach the top of her game.
Harass a group of gnomes with scholarly intent.
Have a second round of revelations.

displayName.english: Mortgage? Can I have less instead?

description.english: Become an urbanite homeowner.
Complete the tragedy of the Kid.
Complete the tragedy of the Revenger.
Complete the tragedy of the Waif.
Complete the tragedy of the Violet Lady.
Complete the tragedy of the Starlit Lady.
Complete the tragedy of the Scarlet Lady.
Help reclaim the throne of the Lunar Palace.
Help Jo's establishment regain popularity.
Arrive on the moon.
Open the door (correctly) during the tragedy of the Starlit Lady.
Learn of a tale that beget only tragedy.
Prevail over the clutch of death.
Die while playing as an egg.

displayName.english: This Hole Was Made For Me

description.english: Fall into a hole during a furious floral fracas.
Run out of Mycelium.
Run out of Dampness.
Run out of Robustness.
Run out of Potency.
Run out of Humanity.
Climb the Great Mountain.
Climb the Great Mountain after visiting a strange temple...
Experience a grotesquely heartwarming familial exchange.
Successfully navigate a labyrinth of subterranean capitalism.
Though I guess that's a bit irrelevant now, isn't it?
Have enough Humanity to endure an entire brotherly conversation.
Have enough Dampness to ascend a child to godhood.
Stumble across a well-established business.
You have graduated from school.

displayName.english: Guess She's Not A Very Good Healer...

description.english: You have killed The Great Healer.
Become the Mayor of Mushroomville (that is what you named it, right?)
You have become a master painter.
You have become the most interesting thief in the land.
Perform exquisitely in a bout of wrestling.
Kill the last remaining survivor of a family.

displayName.english: A Big Ol' Pile of Them Bones

description.english: Indulge Slim Jim in a request, to his detriment.
Defeat the Witch of the Woods.

displayName.english: Though She Be but Little, She is Fierce

description.english: Deafeat the Witch as a Little Brown Mushroom.
Defeat the Wandering Sister.
Prove your skills as a prime hunter.
Prove your skills against a deadly fungal hog.
Summon Jim while attempting to overtake a rival swarm.

displayName.english: Like a Daughter: the Song of Wife

description.english: Become the Phoenix of the South.
Have an enchanting - if not scholarly - night out.
Delight in a particularly doomed evening.
Escape into a lovely dream.
Live a life with a girl that's out of this world.
Catch the shooting star.
Go on a date, dappled in hues of violet.
Have a lovely evening with Caelia, the Scholar.
Become employed by the Clothier - in both work and love.

displayName.english: Two Roads Diverged in a Mushy Wood

description.english: Complete the game for the first time.
Successfully entomb the Witch.
Collect all the backgrounds.
See all events.
Find all the Curios.
Expand your mushroom garden.
Fully expand your mushroom garden.
Grow all the garden mushrooms.
Discover and use a password.
Acquire all of the Music Boxes in the Orchestrion.
Acquire all of the Wax Cylinders in the Orchestrion.
